# removeMotionEffect(_:)

**Instance Method**

Stops applying a motion effect to the view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func removeMotionEffect(_ effect: UIMotionEffect)
```

## Parameters

- **effect**: The motion effect.

## Discussion

Any affected presentation values animate to their post-removal values using the present [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView] animation context.

## Using motion effects

- **addMotionEffect(_:)**: Begins applying a motion effect to the view.
- **motionEffects**: The array of motion effects for the view.
